/blog.title: Blog | Mirascope
/blog.description: The latest news, updates, and insights about Mirascope and LLM application development.

/blog/advanced-prompt-engineering.title: A Guide to Advanced Prompt Engineering | Mirascope
/blog/advanced-prompt-engineering.description: Learn how advanced prompt engineering techniques like in-context learning and few-shot prompts can boost LLM performance and accuracy.

/blog/engineers-should-handle-prompting-.title: Engineers Should Handle Prompting LLMs (and Prompts Should Live in Your Codebase) | Mirascope
/blog/engineers-should-handle-prompting-.description: Many prompt engineering tools neither follow developer best practices, nor manage prompts with their LLM calls. We created Mirascope to address this.

/blog/how-to-build-a-knowledge-graph.title: How to Build a Knowledge Graph from Unstructured Information | Mirascope
/blog/how-to-build-a-knowledge-graph.description: Learn how to build a knowledge graph from unstructured data to efficiently extract entities and relationships from unstructured sources.

/blog/how-to-make-a-chatbot.title: How to Make a Chatbot from Scratch (That Uses LLMs) | Mirascope
/blog/how-to-make-a-chatbot.description: Learn how to make a chatbot from scratch with this step-by-step guide, including tips on integrating LLMs for smarter conversations.

/blog/langchain-alternatives.title: Top 12 LangChain Alternatives for AI Development | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-alternatives.description: We present 12 LangChain alternatives for developing LLM applications in the areas of prompt engineering, agents, LLM orchestration, and data extraction.

/blog/langchain-prompt-template.title: A Guide to Prompt Templates in LangChain | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-prompt-template.description: We explain what a LangChain prompt template is, and how to use it. We also compare this with prompting in Mirascope.

/blog/langchain-rag.title: Getting Started with LangChain RAG | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-rag.description: This LangChain RAG tutorial shows you how to build a RAG pipeline by combining the best elements of LangChain and Mirascope, our lightweight Python toolkit.

/blog/langchain-runnables.title: Understanding LangChain Runnables | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-runnables.description: Learn about LangChain runnables, how they work, and when best to use them. We also contrast runnables with Mirascope's pythonic chaining techniques.

/blog/langchain-structured-output.title: LangChain Structured Output - A Guide to Tools and Methods | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-structured-output.description: This guide covers how to work with LangChain structured output and showcases how Mirascope provides an accessible and flexible solution for developers.

/blog/langchain-sucks.title: Does LangChain Suck? Our Thoughts on Maximizing Its Potential | Mirascope
/blog/langchain-sucks.description: Some developers believe LangChain sucks, but you can leverage its RAG functionality with Mirascope's prompt engineering.

/blog/langfuse-integration.title: Mirascope and Langfuse Integration | Mirascope
/blog/langfuse-integration.description: Mirascope now integrates with Langfuse. Decorated LLM functions can now easily be sent to Langfuse.

/blog/llamaindex-vs-langchain.title: LlamaIndex vs LangChain vs Mirascope - An In-Depth Comparison | Mirascope
/blog/llamaindex-vs-langchain.description: Explore our comprehensive guide on LlamaIndex vs LangChain. We also introduce Mirascope's modular toolkit for LLM application development.

/blog/llm-agents.title: LLM Agents - What They Are, Tools, and Examples | Mirascope
/blog/llm-agents.description: Learn what LLM agents are, how they work, and the tools behind them. Explore real-world examples and see how to build an LLM agent for your projects.

/blog/llm-applications.title: LLM Applications - What They Are and 6 Examples | Mirascope
/blog/llm-applications.description: Curious about LLM applications? Discover what they are and see 6 practical examples of how large language models are being applied across sectors.

/blog/llm-as-judge.title: Using LLM-as-a-Judge to Evaluate AI Outputs | Mirascope
/blog/llm-as-judge.description: Learn how LLM as a judge offers scalable and reliable AI output evaluation by leveraging advanced reasoning and scoring. We also show a basic example of how to build one.

/blog/llm-chaining.title: LLM Chaining - Techniques and Best Practices | Mirascope
/blog/llm-chaining.description: Learn how LLM chaining improves generative AI workflows, enhances responses, and powers sophisticated applications like RAG and autonomous agents.

/blog/llm-evaluation.title: Overview of LLM Evaluation Metrics and Approaches | Mirascope
/blog/llm-evaluation.description: Discover key metrics and methods for comprehensive LLM evaluation. Improve your language model's performance with these proven strategies.

/blog/llm-frameworks.title: Top LLM Frameworks for AI Application Development | Mirascope
/blog/llm-frameworks.description: Learn which LLM frameworks are best suited for building robust AI applications and orchestrating complex workflows, from data retrieval to prompt engineering.

/blog/llm-integration.title: LLM Integration - Key Tools and Techniques | Mirascope
/blog/llm-integration.description: A complete guide to LLM integration-explore technologies, frameworks, best practices, and examples for seamless implementations of language models in your applications.

/blog/llm-orchestration.title: A Guide to LLM Orchestration | Mirascope
/blog/llm-orchestration.description: Explore our detailed guide to LLM orchestration and discover how it improves the performance and efficiency of applications driven by large language models.

/blog/llm-pipeline.title: Building an LLM Pipeline - Tools and Techniques | Mirascope
/blog/llm-pipeline.description: Learn how to build an efficient LLM pipeline, focusing on effective data handling and query generation techniques for retrieval augmented generation.

/blog/llm-prompt.title: LLM Prompt - Examples and Best Practices | Mirascope
/blog/llm-prompt.description: Everything you want to know about LLM prompts, including examples, tips, and coding examples for creating well-structured and effective prompts.

/blog/llm-tools.title: 12 LLM Tools to Help You Build LLM Applications | Mirascope
/blog/llm-tools.description: Here is our short list of LLM tools for any LLM stack, including application development, model serving, chatbots, vector databases, and more.

/blog/mirascope-v1-release.title: Mirascope V1 Release - Lessons Learned from Building an LLM Package | Mirascope
/blog/mirascope-v1-release.description: Mirascope's stable release, V1 has been released. We discuss the reasons behind creating Mirascope and what led us to the changes from the original design to our V1 and what's coming down the road.

/blog/openai-function-calling.title: A Guide to Function Calling in OpenAI | Mirascope
/blog/openai-function-calling.description: OpenAI function calling extends the capabilities of large language models by providing them with tools for calling external APIs and applications.

/blog/prompt-chaining.title: Prompt Chaining in AI Development | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-chaining.description: Prompt chaining is a way to simplify large, complex prompts by breaking them down into smaller prompts, each making their own separate LLM call.

/blog/prompt-engineering-best-practices.title: 8 Prompt Engineering Best Practices and Techniques | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-engineering-best-practices.description: Following prompt engineering best practices helps you elicit accurate and reliable responses from the LLM. Here are 8 best practices with examples.

/blog/prompt-engineering-examples.title: Prompt Engineering Examples and Techniques | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-engineering-examples.description: Learn about prompt engineering examples and techniques for designing clear AI requests. Get the best LLM outputs with our list of practical tips and strategies.

/blog/prompt-engineering-tools.title: 8 of the Best Prompt Engineering Tools in 2025 | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-engineering-tools.description: In this article, we list our 8 top prompt engineering tools to simplify your LLM prompting workflows and provide a great development experience.

/blog/prompt-engineering-vs-fine-tuning.title: Comparing Prompt Engineering vs Fine-Tuning | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-engineering-vs-fine-tuning.description: Learn when to use prompt engineering, fine-tuning, or RAG for tasks ranging from simple queries to specialized applications.

/blog/prompt-evaluation.title: Prompt Evaluation - Methods, Tools, And Best Practices | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-evaluation.description: What is prompt evaluation, and why does it matter? Learn key methods, tools, and best practices to improve LLM outputs and ensure high-quality responses.

/blog/prompt-flow-vs-langchain.title: Comparing Prompt Flow vs LangChain vs Mirascope | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-flow-vs-langchain.description: We do a head-to-head comparison of Prompt Flow vs LangChain, along with our own modular LLM development toolkit, Mirascope.

/blog/prompt-versioning.title: Five Tools to Help You Leverage Prompt Versioning in Your LLM Workflow | Mirascope
/blog/prompt-versioning.description: Complex prompts require adequate prompt versioning. This article explores five tools to help you track changes in your LLM prompts.

/blog/rag-application.title: RAG Application - Benefits, Challenges & How to Build One | Mirascope
/blog/rag-application.description: Learn how a RAG application minimizes hallucinations and delivers domain expertise to your LLM applications. We also show you an example of how to build one.

/blog/rag-llm-example.title: Retrieval Augmented Generation - Examples & How to Build One | Mirascope
/blog/rag-llm-example.description: Understand how RAG works in AI with a real-world RAG LLM example and step-by-step instructions to build a question-answering chatbot application.

/blog/synthetic-data-generation.title: A Guide to Synthetic Data Generation | Mirascope
/blog/synthetic-data-generation.description: Get started with synthetic data generation and learn how to create high-quality artificial datasets for machine learning and analytics.

/docs/lilypad/evaluation/annotations.title: Annotations | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/evaluation/annotations.description: Add labels and feedback to your LLM outputs

/docs/lilypad/evaluation/cost-and-latenc.title: Cost & Latency Tracking | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/evaluation/cost-and-latenc.description: Monitor the performance and cost of your LLM functions

/docs/lilypad/getting-started/open-sourc.title: Open-Source | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/getting-started/open-sourc.description: How Lilypad balances open-source and enterprise features

/docs/lilypad/getting-started/playground.description: No-code interface for experimenting with Lilypad

/docs/lilypad/getting-started/quickstart.title: Quickstart | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/getting-started/quickstart.description: Start using Lilypad in one line of code

/docs/lilypad/getting-started/self-hosti.title: Self Hosting | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/getting-started/self-hosti.description: Run Lilypad in your own infrastructure

/docs/lilypad/observability/spans.title: Spans | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/observability/spans.description: Easily instrument arbitrary blocks of code with OpenTelemetry

/docs/lilypad/observability/versioning.title: Versioning | Lilypad
/docs/lilypad/observability/versioning.description: Track versions of your LLM functions

/docs/mirascope.title: Mirascope | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope.description: Mirascope is a Python library that streamlines working with LLMs

/docs/mirascope/getting-started/help.title: Help | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/getting-started/help.description: How to get help with Mirascope

/docs/mirascope/getting-started/migratio.title: Migration Guide: v0 → v1 | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/getting-started/migratio.description: Learn how to upgrade from Mirascope v0 to v1 with our comprehensive migration guide.

/docs/mirascope/getting-started/quicksta.title: Quickstart | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/getting-started/quicksta.description: Get started with Mirascope across various LLM providers

/docs/mirascope/getting-started/why.title: Why Mirascope? | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/getting-started/why.description: Why use Mirascope for your LLM applications

/docs/mirascope/guides.title: Mirascope Guides | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides.description: A collection of practical examples and tutorials for building AI applications with Mirascope. These guides showcase real-world applications and common patterns using Mirascope's features.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/blog-writi.title: Agent Executor: Blog Writing | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/blog-writi.description: Build an agent system that researches topics and writes blog posts. This guide demonstrates how to combine research and writing capabilities in an agent executor framework.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/documentat.title: Documentation Agent | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/documentat.description: Create an AI assistant that answers questions about documentation by retrieving and ranking relevant content from a vectorstore with LLM-powered reranking.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/local-chat.title: Local Chat with Codebase | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/local-chat.description: Build a fully open-source chatbot that can answer questions about documentation using Llama 3.1 and LlamaIndex for retrieval-augmented generation.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/localized-.title: Localized Agent | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/localized-.description: Build a location-aware chatbot using Google Maps data to provide personalized recommendations based on user queries and location context.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/qwant-sear.title: Qwant Search Agent with Sources | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/qwant-sear.description: Learn how to build a web search agent that uses the Qwant API to find information and provide answers with properly attributed sources.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/sql-agent.title: Generate SQL with LLM | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/sql-agent.description: Create an AI co-pilot for database administrators that transforms natural language queries into SQL statements for database operations.

/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/web-search.title: Web Search Agent | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/agents/web-search.description: Build an agent that searches the web using DuckDuckGo, extracts relevant content from websites, and synthesizes information to answer user queries.

/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.title: Evaluating Documentation Agent | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.description: Implement testing and evaluation strategies for a documentation agent, including LLM reranking verification and code snippet validation.

/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.title: Evaluating Generating SQL with LLM | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.description: Techniques for evaluating SQL agent performance. This guide demonstrates methods to assess query accuracy, SQL correctness, and result relevance.

/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.title: Evaluating Web Search Agent with LLM | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/evals/evaluating-.description: Learn how to evaluate and improve the quality of a web search agent by measuring performance against sample queries with expected outputs.

/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/d.title: Dynamic Configuration & Chaining | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/d.description: Learn how to use dynamic configuration and chain multiple LLM calls for complex workflows. This guide demonstrates how to pass results between calls and modify prompts dynamically.

/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/s.title: Structured Outputs | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/s.description: Learn techniques for extracting structured data from LLM outputs using response models and JSON mode. This guide covers validation, few-shot examples, and output parsing.

/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/t.title: Tools & Agents | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/getting-started/t.description: An introduction to building tools and agents with Mirascope. Learn how to create autonomous systems that can use tools to accomplish tasks.

/docs/mirascope/guides/langgraph-vs-mira.title: LangGraph Quickstart using Mirascope | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/langgraph-vs-mira.description: Implement the LangGraph Quickstart example using Mirascope to create a chatbot with web search tools, conversation history, and human-in-the-loop functionality.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/cod.title: Code Generation and Execution | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/cod.description: Build a safe environment for generating and executing Python code using LLMs with proper safety checks and execution controls

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/doc.title: Document Segmentation | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/doc.description: Learn how to perform semantic document segmentation using LLMs to break down articles into coherent topics and themes for better understanding and analysis.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/ext.title: Extracting from PDF | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/ext.description: Learn how to extract information from PDFs using LLMs, including text-based and vision-based approaches for handling complex documents.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/ext.title: Extraction using Vision | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/ext.description: Learn how to use multimodal LLMs to extract structured information from images with OpenAI and Anthropic models

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/gen.title: Generate Captions for an Image | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/gen.description: Use multimodal LLM capabilities to generate descriptive captions for images by leveraging OpenAI's vision capabilities.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/gen.title: Generate Synthetic Data | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/gen.description: Learn techniques for using LLMs to generate realistic synthetic data in various formats including CSV, structured objects, and pandas DataFrames

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/kno.title: Knowledge Graph | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/kno.description: Build knowledge graphs from unstructured text. This guide demonstrates how to extract entities and relationships to create structured knowledge representations.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/llm.title: LLM Validation With Retries | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/llm.description: Use LLMs for complex validation tasks and automatically reinsert validation errors into subsequent calls to improve results with Mirascope's Tenacity integration.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/nam.title: Named Entity Recognition | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/nam.description: Implement Named Entity Recognition (NER) using LLMs with various levels of nested entity recognition to identify and classify named entities in text.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/o1-.title: o1 Style Thinking | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/o1-.description: Learn how to implement Chain-of-Thought reasoning with LLMs to solve complex tasks by breaking them down into logical steps.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/pii.title: PII Scrubbing | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/pii.description: Create a system to detect and redact personally identifiable information (PII) from text documents using a locally-hosted LLM for enhanced privacy.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/que.title: Query Plan | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/que.description: Learn how to create and execute query plans with LLMs by breaking down complex questions into smaller, more manageable queries for more accurate results.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/rem.title: Removing Semantic Duplicates | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/rem.description: Learn how to use LLMs to identify and remove semantically equivalent items from lists and objects, solving a longstanding problem in natural language processing.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/sea.title: Search with Sources | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/sea.description: Learn how to use LLMs to answer questions using web search while providing source citations to verify accuracy and reduce hallucinations.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/spe.title: Transcribing Speech | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/spe.description: Use multimodal LLMs like Google's Gemini to transcribe speech from audio files and extract additional metadata

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/sup.title: Support Ticket Routing | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/sup.description: Build a system that analyzes support tickets, categorizes issues, and routes them to the appropriate department with relevant context for efficient resolution.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.title: Text Classification | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.description: Implement binary and multi-class text classification using LLMs, with examples for spam detection and sentiment analysis that outperform traditional machine learning methods.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.title: Text Summarization | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.description: Learn techniques for text summarization with LLMs, from simple prompts to more advanced approaches using outlines and segmentation for more coherent and comprehensive summaries.

/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.title: Text Translation | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/more-advanced/tex.description: Build advanced language translation systems. This guide demonstrates techniques for improving translation quality through parametrization and multi-provider approaches.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Chain of Thought | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement chain-of-thought prompting to improve LLM reasoning. This guide demonstrates how to structure prompts that encourage step-by-step problem solving.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Chain of Verification: Enhancing LLM Accuracy through Self-Verification | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement Chain of Verification to improve LLM accuracy by generating verification questions about initial responses and answering them systematically

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Common Phrases (Prompt Mining) | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Discover how using domain-specific terminology and common phrases can significantly improve LLM responses through Prompt Mining techniques.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Contrastive Chain of Thought | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn to apply Contrastive Chain of Thought by providing both correct and incorrect reasoning examples to improve LLM problem-solving

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Decomposed Prompting: Enhancing LLM Problem-Solving with Tool-Based Subproblems | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Explore Decomposed Prompting (DECOMP), a technique that breaks down complex problems into smaller subproblems and utilizes tools to solve each step, enhancing an LLM's problem-solving capabilities.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Demonstration Ensembling: Enhancing LLM Responses with Aggregated Examples | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Improve LLM responses by implementing Demonstration Ensembling to combine outputs from multiple random subsets of examples

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: DiVeRSe: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with Prompt Variations | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement the DiVeRSe technique to improve LLM reasoning by generating multiple prompt variations of the same question for better accuracy

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Emotion Prompting | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Enhance LLM responses by adding emotionally significant phrases to prompts to increase engagement and improve output quality

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Least to Most: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with Subproblem Decomposition | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn to implement the Least to Most technique, which enhances LLM reasoning by breaking down complex problems into smaller, more manageable subproblems for improved accuracy.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Mixture of Reasoning: Enhancing LLM Performance with Multiple Techniques | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn how to implement Mixture of Reasoning, a technique that combines multiple prompt engineering approaches to improve LLM performance across a variety of tasks.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Plan and Solve | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement the Plan and Solve technique, a variation of Chain of Thought prompting that improves reasoning by first understanding the problem, devising a plan, and then solving step by step.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Prompt Paraphrasing: Generating Diverse Prompts for LLM Testing and Evaluation | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Explore Prompt Paraphrasing, a technique for creating ensembles of prompt variations through translation and back-translation to test and evaluate LLM performance across different phrasings.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Rephrase and Respond | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn to implement the Rephrase and Respond technique to improve LLM comprehension by having models rephrase questions before answering them

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Rereading | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Explore the Rereading technique that improves LLM performance by asking the model to reread a question, particularly effective for older models across various reasoning tasks.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Reverse Chain of Thought: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with Self-Reflection | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement Reverse Chain of Thought, a technique that enhances LLM reasoning by encouraging the model to reflect on and correct its own thought process through query reconstruction and comparison.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Role Prompting | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement role-based prompting to improve LLM responses. This guide demonstrates how assigning roles affects response style and quality.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Self-Ask | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn how to implement the Self-Ask technique with LLMs to enhance reasoning capabilities by teaching models to ask and answer their own follow-up questions

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Self-Consistency: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with Multiple Outputs | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement the Self-Consistency technique, which enhances LLM reasoning by generating multiple Chain of Thought responses and selecting the most common answer for improved accuracy.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Self-Refine: Enhancing LLM Outputs Through Iterative Self-Improvement | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn how to implement Self-Refine to improve LLM outputs by using iterative feedback and refinement cycles to enhance responses

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Sim to M: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with Perspective-Taking | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Master the Sim to M technique to improve LLM reasoning by simulating different perspectives in complex scenarios involving multiple viewpoints

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Skeleton of Thought: Enhancing LLM Response Speed | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Speed up LLM responses with the Skeleton of Thought technique by creating initial outlines and expanding individual points in parallel

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Step-back Prompting: Enhancing LLM Reasoning with High-Level Questions | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Learn to implement Step-back prompting, a technique that improves LLM reasoning by asking a high-level question about relevant concepts before addressing the original query.

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: System to Attention (S2A): Enhancing LLM Focus with Query Filtering | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement System to Attention (S2A) technique to filter irrelevant information from queries for more accurate and focused LLM responses

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Tabular Chain of Thought | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Implement the Tabular Chain of Thought technique to structure LLM reasoning in a table format for improved problem-solving accuracy

/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.title: Thread of Thought | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/guides/prompt-engineerin.description: Explore Thread of Thought (THoT), an extension of Chain of Thought that provides a structured approach for LLMs to analyze information step-by-step, particularly effective for tasks with large context.

/docs/mirascope/integrations/hyperdx.title: HyperDX Integration | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/integrations/hyperdx.description: Integration with HyperDX for observability and logging

/docs/mirascope/integrations/langfuse.title: Langfuse Integration | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/integrations/langfuse.description: Integration with Langfuse for LLM observability

/docs/mirascope/integrations/logfire.title: Logfire Integration | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/integrations/logfire.description: Integration with Logfire for structured logging

/docs/mirascope/integrations/otel.title: OpenTelemetry Integration | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/integrations/otel.description: Integration with OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing

/docs/mirascope/learn.title: Overview | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn.description: A comprehensive guide to Mirascope's core components and features. This overview provides a roadmap for learning how to build AI-powered applications with Mirascope.

/docs/mirascope/learn/agents.title: Agents | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/agents.description: Learn how to build autonomous and semi-autonomous LLM-powered agents with Mirascope that can use tools, maintain state, and execute multi-step reasoning processes.

/docs/mirascope/learn/async.title: Async | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/async.description: Learn how to use asynchronous programming with Mirascope to efficiently handle I/O-bound operations, improve responsiveness, and run multiple LLM calls concurrently.

/docs/mirascope/learn/calls.title: Calls | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/calls.description: Learn how to make API calls to various LLM providers using Mirascope. This guide covers basic usage, handling responses, and configuring call parameters for different providers.

/docs/mirascope/learn/chaining.title: Chaining | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/chaining.description: Learn how to combine multiple LLM calls in sequence to solve complex tasks through functional chaining, nested chains, conditional execution, and parallel processing.

/docs/mirascope/learn/evals.title: Evals | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/evals.description: Learn how to evaluate LLM outputs using multiple approaches including LLM-based evaluators, panels of judges, and hardcoded evaluation criteria.

/docs/mirascope/learn/extensions/custom_.title: Custom LLM Provider | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/extensions/custom_.description: Learn how to implement a custom LLM provider for Mirascope by creating provider-specific classes and utility functions using the call_factory method.

/docs/mirascope/learn/extensions/middlew.title: Middleware | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/extensions/middlew.description: Learn how to create custom middleware for Mirascope using the middleware_factory helper function to add functionality like logging, analytics, or database integration to your LLM calls.

/docs/mirascope/learn/json_mode.title: JSON Mode | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/json_mode.description: Learn how to request structured JSON outputs from LLMs with Mirascope's JSON Mode for easier parsing, validation, and integration with your applications.

/docs/mirascope/learn/local_models.title: Local (Open-Source) Models | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/local_models.description: Learn how to use Mirascope with locally hosted open-source models through Ollama, vLLM, and other APIs with OpenAI compatibility.

/docs/mirascope/learn/mcp/client.title: Client | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/mcp/client.description: Learn how to use the Mirascope MCP Client to interact with Model Context Protocol servers, accessing standardized resources, tools, and prompts through either stdio or SSE connections.

/docs/mirascope/learn/output_parsers.title: Output Parsers | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/output_parsers.description: Learn how to process and structure raw LLM outputs into usable formats using Mirascope's flexible output parsers for more reliable and application-ready results.

/docs/mirascope/learn/prompts.title: Prompts | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/prompts.description: Master the art of creating effective prompts for LLMs using Mirascope. Learn about message roles, multi-modal inputs, and dynamic prompt configuration.

/docs/mirascope/learn/provider-specific/.title: Anthropic | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/provider-specific/.description: Learn about Anthropic-specific features in Mirascope, including prompt caching for message and tool contexts to optimize token usage with Claude models.

/docs/mirascope/learn/provider-specific/.title: OpenAI | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/provider-specific/.description: Explore OpenAI-specific features in Mirascope, including structured outputs with strict JSON schema adherence, and the Realtime API for dynamic, interactive applications with real-time capabilities.

/docs/mirascope/learn/response_models.title: Response Models | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/response_models.description: Learn how to structure and validate LLM outputs using Pydantic models for type safety, automatic validation, and easier data manipulation across different providers.

/docs/mirascope/learn/retries.title: Retries | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/retries.description: Learn how to implement robust retry mechanisms for LLM API calls using Mirascope and Tenacity to handle rate limits, validation errors, and other failures.

/docs/mirascope/learn/streams.title: Streams | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/streams.description: Learn how to process LLM responses in real-time as they are generated using Mirascope's streaming capabilities for more interactive and responsive applications.

/docs/mirascope/learn/tools.title: Tools | Mirascope
/docs/mirascope/learn/tools.description: Learn how to define, use, and chain together LLM-powered tools in Mirascope to extend model capabilities with external functions, data sources, and system interactions.

/privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Mirascope
/privacy.description: How Mirascope collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

/terms/service.title: Terms of Service | Mirascope
/terms/service.description: Legal terms governing your use of Mirascope's platform and services.

/terms/use.title: Terms of Use | Mirascope
/terms/use.description: Guidelines and rules for using the Mirascope website.
